title: Tunjon station
text: Tunjŏn station is a railway station in <a href="Sudong">Sudong District</a>, <a href="South%20Hamgyong%20Province">South Hamgyŏng Province</a>, <a href="North%20Korea">North Korea</a>. It is located on the <a href="Pyongra%20Line">P'yŏngra Line</a> of the <a href="Korean%20State%20Railway">Korean State Railway</a>, and is the starting point of the <a href="Kowon%20Tangwang%20Line">Kowŏn Colliery Line</a>.
